contact.explanation: If you have a question about an order, please send us the SHIPMENT NR. Messages without this number cannot be processed.
contact.explanation2: In case of a certified order, please provide the TRACKING CODE and the shipping date, if possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Your message has been sent. If required, we will answer as soon as possible.

cart.empty: You have no items on your shopping cart.
cart.headline: {{orders}} orders ({{articles}} articles) to buy now

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.paypal: The balance of your user account is not sufficient to pay for this order. You can credit your user account with PayPal® to pay for this order. Additional fees apply if you credit your account with Paypal®.
checkout.bank: The balance of your user account is not sufficient to pay for this order. You can purchase the cards now and then credit your user account via bank transfer to pay for this order.
checkout.instabuy: You have sufficient balance on your account. The order will be paid with your online funds.
checkout.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to buy these articles?

imprint.legal: The Sammelkartenmarkt Ltd. & Co. KG is represented by its personally liable partner: Sammelkartenmarkt Limited, 69 Great Hampton Street, Birmingham B18 6EW, Company Number 06245645, Companies House Cardiff, GB. This in turn is represented by its managing directors Luis Torres, Dr. Matthias Knelangen, Marko Schädlich

evaluation.title: Evaluation for Order {{id}} from {{seller}}
evaluation.guide1: Do not give an overall neutral or bad evaluation before trying to contact the seller first. Sellers are human and can make mistakes. Give them a chance to fix them.
evaluation.guide2: Do not give an overall neutral or bad evaluation if you would buy from this seller again.
evaluation.guide3: Do not give an overall neutral or bad evaluation if the seller made mistakes but fixed them.
evaluation.guide4: Do not give an overall neutral or bad evaluation if the packaging was not good but the items where unharmed.
evaluation.guide5: If you did not receive this shipment do not evaluate it. Contact our support so they mark it as lost.
evaluation.guide6: Mark or explain why you give overall neutral or bad evaluations, otherwise they will be neutralized.

order.title: Order Nr.:
order.outstanding: You must still pay {{sum}} for your unpaid orders.

payment.cancel: Your Paypal account has not been charged.
payment.close: You can now close this tab.
payment.paypal_p1: When crediting your account with PayPal, a fee of 0.35 Euro + 5% of the credited amount applies.
payment.paypal_p2: Please remember that crediting your account via a SEPA bank transfer is free of charge. A european bank transfer usually takes no longer than two business days.
payment.bank: Credit my Account via Bank Transfer
payment.bank_p1: To transfer money to your user account, please wire the desired amount to the following bank account.
payment.bank_p12: Always indicate {{user}} in the transfer reason (reference) field while wire transferring money to your MKM Account!
payment.bank_p13: Do not enter any other information in this field since it may slow down the payment process.
payment.bank_p14: Make sure that you (or your bank) use(s) an International Payment Order Form in conformity with the SEPA (Single European Payment Area) agreement.
payment.bank_p15: Banks charge extra fees on any transactions done without the correct form.

sell.errorTooManyArticles: Error: You can't list that many articles.

recover.explanation: Please fill out the following form to recover your username or password.
recover.success_username: Your request was executed successfully. Your username has been sent to you by email
recover.success_password: Your password was reset. We generated a new password for you, which has been sent to you by email.
recover.error: There was an error when submitting your request.

register.referral_description: If you were referred to MagicCardMarket.eu by another user, you can enter their username here:
register.coupon_description: If you have a coupon for new users, enter the code here:
register.terms: I hereby agree to the General Terms and Conditions as well as to the Privacy Policy of the Sammelkartenmarkt Ltd. & Co. KG.
register.cancellation: I have read and received the Cancellation Policy.
register.provision: I agree to and expressly request that the provision of services ordered by me begin before expiry of the revocation period. I am aware that I shall lose my right of revocation in case of the complete fulfillment of the contract by you.
register.age: I am at least 18 years old
register.success: We have sent you an email containing instructions to activate your account. This is needed to validate your email address. If you are using a free mail service like Hotmail or Yahoo Mail and didn't receive the email, it is possible that it was placed in your spam mail folder. If you do not receive an email, please log in and check that your email address was entered correctly.
